name: Dice Rollin' Submarine Video Game
description:
Roll your crew dice and slot them into actions to move your submarine around and collect treasure. 

Crew actions can only be used once per reroll and crew dice must match the requirements shown in the action slot to be used.

Your goal is to collect as many points as you can before you get a game over.

You will game over if you breach the surface, run out of oxygen, or run out of health.
